rukus.text: Did you see the one who turned away
and gave a little and was stingy
Does he have knowledge of the unseen, so he sees
Or was he not informed of what is in scriptures of Moses
and Abraham, the one who fulfilled (his duties)
That no bearer bears burden of another
and that there is not (any reward) for the human being except what he tried for
And that his efforts will be seen
then he is rewarded with the full reward
And that the final ending is to your Master
And that He is he who makes (everyone) laugh and cry
And He is he who causes death and gives life
And that He created the two types, the male and the female
from sperm when it is ejected
And that the other creation is His responsibility
And that He is he who makes rich and makes poor (or gives property)
And that He is he who is Master of the Sirius (the brightest star at night)
And that He destroyed the earlier Aad
and Thamud, and He did not leave (anyone alive)
And (He destroyed) people of Noah before (them), indeed they were more wrongdoer and more rebellious
And He overthrew the turned over cities
and it was covered by what covers
So which of your Master's favors do you doubt
This is a warner like the previous warners
The upcoming (judgment day) is coming up
No one other than God can expose it
Are you surprised by this saying
and you laugh and you do not cry
and you are negligent
So show humbleness to God and serve Him
